name: Hammurabi - WindowsCE 2.11
description:
Hammurabi is a text-based strategy game focused on resource management, in which the player, identified in the text as the ancient Babylonian king Hammurabi, enters numbers in response to the questions posed by the game. The resources that the player must manage are people, acres of land, and bushels of grain. These are managed over ten rounds, each representing one year.

from Windows CE 2.11

ARM 1100 (4K)

MIPS 4000 (1K)

SH3 (1K)

SH4 (4K)

Download as a .zip file, unpack and copy the corresponding .CAB file to your device
